name: accumulate drawn objects
draw tracks
draw current plan lines
func:
robot = msg.payload

wps = robot.bt.current_plan.waypoints
if(!wps) return

points = []
for(var i in wps){
        points.push([wps[i].lat, wps[i].lon])
}

heavy = 7
normal = 4
weak = 0.1

switch(robot.bt.current_plan.plan_state){
    case 0: //running
        c = global.get("gui.colors.selected")
        w = heavy
        break
    case 1: // stopped
        c = global.get("gui.colors.active")
        w = normal
        break
    case 2: // paused
        c = global.get("gui.colors.active")
        w = normal
        break
    case 3: // emergency
        c = global.get("gui.colors.old")
        w = weak
        break
    case 4: // received
        c = global.get("gui.colors.active")
        w = heavy
        break
    default:
        c = global.get("gui.colors.old")
        w = normal
        break
}

if(robot.gui.is_old) c = global.get("gui.colors.old")

line = {name: robot.base.name+"_vehicle_plan",
        layer: "planning",
        line:points,
        color:c,
        weight:w,
        editable:false,
        clickable:false,
        dashArray:"1,1,2,20"
}
return {payload:line}

name: marker on current wp
func:
robot = msg.payload

c = global.get("gui.colors.selected")
if(robot.gui.is_old) c = global.get("gui.colors.old")


return {payload:
        {
            action:"point",
            name: robot.base.name+"_current_wp",
            label:null,
            layer:"planning",
            draggable:false,
            lat:robot.bt.current_wp.lat,
            lon:robot.bt.current_wp.lon,
            ttl:0,
            icon:"locate",
            iconColor:c,
            tooltip:robot.base.name+"'s current WP"
        }
}

name: create and select new plan
Prepare rename
rename selected plan
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

new_name = msg.payload
if(new_name == "") return

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
if(new_name in Object.keys(plans)) return

plan = plans[global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")]
delete plans[plan.name]

plan.name = new_name
plans[new_name] = plan
global.set("planning.plans", plans)
global.set("gui.selected_plan_name", new_name)

return {}

global.set("planning.plans", plans)
global.set("gui.selected_plan_name", null)

return {}

name: toggle
make mission control
make command
validate and edit WP
list waypoints
selected wp properties
func:
empty = {payload:""}

reset = [
    empty,
    empty,
    empty,
    empty,
    {payload:false},
    empty,
    empty,
    {payload:false}
    ]
    
wp_name = global.get("gui.selected_waypoint_name")
plan_name = global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")
plans = global.get("planning.plans")
if (!plans) return reset

plan = plans[plan_name]
if (!plan) return reset

swp = plan.waypoints[wp_name]
if (!swp) return reset

lat = (swp.lat+"").substring(0,9)
lon = (swp.lon+"").substring(0,9)

return [
    {payload: lat + ", "+ lon},
    {payload:swp.depth},
    {payload:swp.rpm},
    {payload:swp.speed},
    {payload:swp.use_rpm},
    {payload:swp.tolerance},
    {payload:swp.arrival_heading},
    {payload:swp.use_heading}
    ]

name: Prepare rename
rename selected wp
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

new_name = msg.payload

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
plan_name = global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")
plan = plans[plan_name]
if(new_name in Object.keys(plan.waypoints)) return

wp = plan.waypoints[global.get("gui.selected_waypoint_name")]
delete plan.waypoints[wp.name]

wp_i = plan.waypoint_order.indexOf(wp.name)
wp.name = new_name

plan.waypoints[new_name] = wp
plan.waypoint_order[wp_i] = wp.name


global.set("planning.plans", plans)
global.set("gui.selected_waypoint_name", new_name)

return {}

name: Prepare delete
delete selected wp
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
plan = plans[global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")]
wp = plan.waypoints[global.get("gui.selected_waypoint_name")]
delete plan.waypoints[wp.name]
new_order = []
for(const wp_i in plan.waypoint_order){
    wp_i_name = plan.waypoint_order[wp_i]
    if(wp_i_name === wp.name) continue
    new_order.push(wp_i_name)
}
plan.waypoint_order = new_order

global.set("planning.plans", plans)
global.set("gui.selected_waypoint_name", null)

return {}

global.set("planning.tracks", global.get("planning.tracks") || {})

name: point can only happen if planning mode = true
add new wp to selected_plan
func:
point = msg.payload
if(!point.name || point.name==="") return

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
if(!(plans)){
    node.warn("Plans:"+plans)
    return
}

plan_name = global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")
plan = plans[plan_name]


function new_wp(point){
    return {
        name:point.name,
        lat:point.lat,
        lon:point.lon,
        depth:0,
        rpm:0,
        speed:0,
        use_rpm:false,
        tolerance:1.5,
        arrival_heading:0,
        use_heading:false
    }
}

function copy_wp(wp, point){
    return {
        name:point.name,
        lat:point.lat,
        lon:point.lon,
        depth:wp.depth,
        rpm:wp.rpm,
        speed:wp.speed,
        use_rpm:wp.use_rpm,
        tolerance:wp.tolerance,
        arrival_heading:0,
        use_heading:false
    }
}

if(plan.waypoint_order.length > 0){
    prev_wp_name = plan.waypoint_order[plan.waypoint_order.length-1]
    prev_wp = plan.waypoints[prev_wp_name]
    wp = copy_wp(prev_wp, point)
}else{
    wp = new_wp(point)
}

plan.waypoints[wp.name] = wp
plan.waypoint_order.push(wp.name)
plans[plan_name] = plan
global.set("planning.plans", plans)

return msg

name: prepare plan text
func:
srn = global.get("gui.selected_robot_name")
if(!srn) return
robots = global.get("robot_states")
robot = robots[srn]
if(!robot) return

plan = robot.bt.current_plan
e = "?"
c = ""
switch(plan.plan_state){
    case 0: //running
        c = global.get("gui.colors.selected")
        e = "▶️"
        break
    case 1: // stopped
        c = global.get("gui.colors.old")
        e = "⏹️"
        break
    case 2: // paused
        c = global.get("gui.colors.active")
        e = "⏸️"
        break
    case 3: // emergency
        c = global.get("gui.colors.old")
        e = "‼️"
        break
    case 4: // received
        c = global.get("gui.colors.active")
        e = "📥"
        break
    case 5: // complete
        c = global.get("gui.colors.active")
        e = "✅" 
        break
}

t = e + " <font color=" + c +">" + plan.name

return {payload:t}

name: compare plan to gui
func:
srn = global.get("gui.selected_robot_name")
if(!srn) return
robots = global.get("robot_states")
robot = robots[srn]
if(!robot) return

robot_plan = robot.bt.current_plan

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
gui_plan = plans[robot_plan.name]

global.set("gui.plan_is_synched", false)

if(!gui_plan) return {payload:false}

if(gui_plan.hash != robot_plan.hash) return {payload:false}

global.set("gui.plan_is_synched", true)
return {payload:true}

name: Prepare delete
delete selected track
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

tracks = global.get("planning.tracks")
track = tracks[global.get("gui.selected_track_name")]
delete tracks[track.name]
drawn_tracks = global.get("gui.drawn_track_names")
drawn_tracks.delete(track.name)

global.set("planning.tracks", tracks)
global.set("gui.selected_track_name", null)
global.set("gui.drawn_track_names", drawn_tracks)

name: Prepare rename
func:
name = global.get("gui.selected_track_name")
if(!name) return
rtn = global.get("gui.recording_track_name")
if(name == rtn) return
return {payload:"Rename "+ name}

name: rename selected track
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

new_name = msg.payload

tracks = global.get("planning.tracks")
if(new_name in Object.keys(tracks)) return

track = tracks[global.get("gui.selected_track_name")]
delete tracks[track.name]


drawn_tracks = global.get("gui.drawn_track_names") || new Set()
if(drawn_tracks.has(track.name)){
    drawn_tracks.delete(track.name)
    drawn_tracks.add(new_name)
    global.set("gui.drawn_track_names", drawn_tracks)
}

track.name = new_name
tracks[new_name] = track
global.set("planning.tracks", tracks)
global.set("gui.selected_track_name", new_name)



return {}

name: setup recording
record
func:
tracks = global.get("planning.tracks")
robots = global.get("robot_states")

there_is_recording = false

function round(value, precision) {
    var multiplier = Math.pow(10, precision || 0);
    return Math.round(value * multiplier) / multiplier;
}

function make_record(robot){
    b = robot.base
    t = robot.bt
    wp = robot.bt.current_wp
    // this is in the order of global.get("planning.track_columns")
    return [
        parseInt(robot.last_update),
        "",
        round(b.lat, 6),
        round(b.lon, 6),
        round(b.utm_x, 2),
        round(b.utm_y, 2),
        b.utm_z,
        round(b.heading, 2),
        round(b.roll, 2),
        round(b.pitch, 2),
        round(b.depth, 2),
        round(b.altitude, 2),
        round(b.vbs, 1),
        round(b.lcg, 1),
        round(b.tcg, 1),
        round(b.t1),
        round(b.t2),
        round(b.batt_v, 1),
        round(b.batt_percent),
        round(b.gps_lat, 6),
        round(b.gps_lon, 6),
        t.tip.name,
        t.tip.status[0],
        t.current_plan.name,
        wp.name,
        round(wp.lat, 6),
        round(wp.lon, 6),
        round(wp.pose.pose.position.x, 2),
        round(wp.pose.pose.position.y, 2),
        wp.goal_tolerance,
        wp.z_control_mode,
        wp.travel_altitude,
        wp.travel_depth,
        wp.speed_control_mode,
        wp.travel_rpm,
        wp.travel_speed,
        round(wp.arrival_heading, 1),
        wp.use_heading
    ]
}


for(const track_name in tracks){
    track = tracks[track_name]
    if(!track.recording) continue
        
    robot = robots[track.robot_name]
    if(!robot){
        track.end = Date.now()/1000
        track.recording = false
        track.data[track.data.length-1][1] = "recording_stop"
        continue
    }
    // basically everything except the GUI stuff
    r = make_record(robot)
    
    if(track.data.length > 0){
        prev_point = track.data[track.data.length-1]
        if(prev_point && robot.gui.is_old){
            // we have already recorded this, dont record more...
            if(prev_point[1] == "Lost connection") continue
            // record the loss
            r[1] = "Lost connection"
        }
    }
    
    
    // a message over-writes any auto annotations
    if(msg.payload && msg.topic=="message"){
        if(msg.payload != "Cancel") r[1] = msg.payload
    }
    
    track.data.push(r)
    there_is_recording = true
    
}

// only send a signal if there is a recording happening
if(there_is_recording) return {}

name: lock track
func:
name = global.get("gui.selected_track_name")
if(!name) return

tracks = global.get("planning.tracks")
track = tracks[name]

if(!track) return

track.locked = msg.payload

global.set("planning.tracks", tracks)

return {}

name: handle menu option
receive track
func:
if(!msg.bt.bt_cmd){
    node.status("No bt cmd")
    return
}
track_str = msg.bt.bt_cmd.track
if(!track_str) return
i = JSON.parse(track_str)

tracks = global.get("planning.tracks")
tracks[i.name] = i
global.set("planning.tracks", tracks)
node.status("Added "+ i.name + " to tracks")

return {}

name: List track properties
update chart keys
update chart
set start to last
func:
tracks = global.get("planning.tracks")
if(!tracks) return
stn = global.get("gui.selected_track_name")
if(!stn) return
track = tracks[stn]
if(track.data.length < 1) return

first = track.data[0]
last = track.data[track.data.length-1]

t0 = parseInt(first.last_update/1000)
tf = parseInt(last.last_update/1000)


duration = global.get("gui.chart_duration") || 10

return {payload: tf-t0 - duration}

name: prepare plan
func:
name = global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")
if(!name) return
plans = global.get("planning.plans")
plan = plans[name]
if(!plan) return

lines = []

for(const wp_name of plan.waypoint_order){
    wp = plan.waypoints[wp_name]
    line = [
        wp.name,
        wp.lat,
        wp.lon,
        wp.depth,
        wp.rpm,
        wp.speed,
        wp.use_rpm,
        wp.tolerance]
    lines.push(line)
}

fp = "/data/static/"+ plan.name+ ".csv"
save_out = {payload:lines, filename:fp}
msg.filename = fp
return [save_out, msg, null]
